@deathbysniper97 wrote:

Hey guys,
so this is my very sketchy way of implementing the Christmas Cracker to my 667:

if(itemUsedId == 962 && itemUsedWithId == 962) { int[] CrackerItems = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, }; //Other ids go in there as well player.getInventory().deleteItem(962, 1); for (int i = 0; i < CrackerItems.length; i++) player.getInventory().addItem(CrackerItems[], 1); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You have pulled the christmas cracker!"); return; }
So basically, when I use a Christmas Cracker on a Christmas Cracker, it is supposed to give you one of the CrackerItems, but when you do it in game, it gives you EVERY ONE of the CrackerItems
I think the problem is in the line of code for (int i =0; i < CrackerItems.length; i++)
I just want it to give you ONE of the CrackerItems

If you can help, i greatly appreciate it, but if you have the code for how to actually add the Cracker to a 667 (which there isnt a tut anywhere for), i would appreciate it if you put that up for me
Thanks!!!
